notes:
Their bodies decay a lot faster than other bodies, approx 1 minute.

Cake golems will simultaneously spawn in various locations in Thais, Carlin, Edron, Darashia and Liberty Bay, approximately on the hour after server save of the event (CEST), and respawn every hour after that.  On Antica, 21 February 2022 they spawned at 12:04 CEST.
name: Cake Golem
strategy: Kill them to loot [[Sweet and Sugary Substance]] or lure them into machines to help in bridge building (see: location). They are not dangerous so you may also ignore them.
